health.gov.au transformation

This is a prototype for the development of health.gov.au based on the DTA's UI-kit (that's why it looks so simple)

  • Home
  • Breadcrumb 1
  • Breadcrumb 2

In this section

  • What is this?
  • What's it based on?
  • How is it built?
  • List of prototypes

What is this?

This is a working prototype representing the future vision for health.gov.au. It will develop incrementally based on the principles of agile development.

What's is it based on?

  1. Folk's 'future state' concepts
  2. The health.gov.au project team's discovery work via user research and stakeholder engagement
  3. The DTA's GOV.AU UI Kit

How is it built?

The prototype comprises of a suite of front-end components, including:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Images

The build is developed locally with code collaboration via GitHub.

List of prototypes

  • Girls Make Your Move

    The initial prototype for the Girls Make Your Move campaign website based on the UI-kit.

  • Don't Make Smokes Your Story
